Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

Band-Pass Filter

Discussion

This filter only allows frequencies around the center frequency to pass. This effect is useful for simulating things like telephone calls.

Preferences:

"Bandpass Center": Center Frequency. Range: 20.0 to 20000.0 Hz.

"Bandpass Width": Width of Bandpass. Range: 20.0 to 20000.0 Hz.


Group: Digital Filter Services
Related Sections: High-Pass Filter, Low-Pass Filter, Resonator Filter
